notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: D.T.G., P.H.K., P.B.N. and C.H.H. designed and proposed the research. D.T.G., N.K.H., P.T.L.A., N.T.T.H. and L.K.L. performed morphological, biomass analysis and stem anatomical characteristics. D.T.G., P.T.L.A., N.T.T. determined total flavonoids contents. D.T.G., L.K.L., T.D.K., P.B.N. performed gene expression and analyzed all data. D.T.G. wrote the manuscript. C.H.H., P.H.K., P.B.N., T.D.K. revised the manuscript. C.H.H. is the corresponding author and holds all the responsibilities related to this manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
